articles.author: Rachit Thukral
articles.title: Indian GP organisers "working relentlessly" to resolve MotoGP visa issues - Motorsport.com
articles.description: The organiser of the Indian Grand Prix says it is ”working relentlessly” to ensure MotoGP teams and riders receive their visas on time to take part in this weekend’s race.
articles.content: India is set to host its first ever MotoGP race at the Buddh International Circuit on the outskirts of Delhi on 24 September, but the event has been embroiled by problems with visas and custom cleara… [+2957 chars]

articles.author: Maziar Motamedi
articles.title: Cristiano Ronaldo gets massive welcome in Iran ahead of closed-doors match - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: Thousands turned up to welcome the footballer ahead of AFC Champions League match to be played behind closed doors.
articles.content: Tehran, Iran Hundreds of football fans welcomed Cristiano Ronaldo in Tehran as the Portugal football player arrived in the Iranian capital with the Al Nassr squad ahead of the AFC Champions League ma… [+4107 chars]
